abilities.name: Daemonic Destruction
abilities.rule: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6 for each of this modelâ€™s remaining wounds: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

abilities.name: Flying Horror
abilities.rule: Each time this model ends a Normal or Advance move, select one enemy unit it moved over during that move. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.
